name: ray.air.util.tensor_extensions.pandas.column_needs_tensor_extension
summary: Return whether the provided pandas Series column needs a tensor extension
desc:
representation. This tensor extension representation provides more efficient slicing
and interop with ML frameworks.

args.name: s
args.desc:
The pandas Series column that may need to be represented using the tensor
extension.

returns: Whether the provided Series needs a tensor extension representation.
